mapper.insert: insert into tbl_account( account_id, author_id, name, phone, registration_number, bank_name, account_holder_name, account_number, id_card, copy_of_bankbook ) values ( seq_account.nextval, #{authorId}, #{name}, #{phone}, #{registrationNumber}, #{bankName}, #{accountHolderName}, #{accountNumber}, #{idCard}, #{copyOfBankbook} )
